title: How to Customize Your Guitar Hero Controller Buttons

steps.headline: Acquire a Guitar Hero controller.
steps.description: Any one will work it up to you.

steps.headline: Carefully start to screw off the neck of the controller.
steps.description: A Phillips head will be needed for this.

steps.headline: After unscrewing all the screws, put them in a safe place.
steps.description: Now we need to focus on the top of the neck, where the buttons are.

steps.headline: Notice that there are two screws holding in a plate for the buttons.
steps.description: Unscrew that, but put the screws in a safe place.

steps.headline: Re-arrange the buttons to your choosing, screw the plate back in, and screw everything else back in.

text: Acquire a Guitar Hero controller. Any one will work it up to you. Carefully start to screw off the neck of the controller. A Phillips head will be needed for this. After unscrewing all the screws, put them in a safe place. Now we need to focus on the top of the neck, where the buttons are. Notice that there are two screws holding in a plate for the buttons. Unscrew that, but put the screws in a safe place. Re-arrange the buttons to your choosing, screw the plate back in, and screw everything else back in.  Enjoy your "new" guitar!
